title: Troubling signs for Bitcoin as U.S. investors pull back
description:
Quick Take The summer’s end is ushering in continued sideways price action for Bitcoin, as critical indicators point to a lackluster spot demand. The Coinbase premium index, a barometer of US investors’ buying pressure gauged by CryptoQuant, has taken a nosedive. This metric delineates the percent disparity between the Coinbase Pro price (USD pair) and […]

The post Troubling signs for Bitcoin as U.S. investors pull back appeared first on CryptoSlate.
